process.description: TCP4-2239 Verify Conversational Screen and Send Email
process.name: TCP4-2239 Verify Conversational Screen and Send Email
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_3" name="StartEvent" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:config="{"web_entry":null}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_10</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:parallelGateway id="node_8" name="Parallel Gateway" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_10</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_21</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:parallelGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_10" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_8"/>
    <bpmn:task id="node_11" name="Form Task 1" pm:screenRef="14" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_5</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_12" name="Form Task 2" pm:screenRef="15" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="requester" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_21</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_2</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" name="" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_11"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_21" name="" sourceRef="node_8" targetRef="node_12"/>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_31" name="Send Email" pm:config="{"emailServer":"","type":"text","subject":"Dear{{name}}","textBody":"Confirm the reception.\nYour answer was {{select}} .","screenRef":null,"users":[],"groups":[],"addEmails":["{{email}}"],"requestRecipients":[],"attachments":[],"usersAndGroupsOptionSelected":false}" implementation="connector-send-email/processmaker-communication-email-send">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_2</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_9</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_34" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_5</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_4</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_2" name="" sourceRef="node_12" targetRef="node_31"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_5" name="" sourceRef="node_11" targetRef="node_34"/>
    <bpmn:boundaryEvent id="node_6" name="Boundary Conditional Event" attachedToRef="node_31">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_4</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:conditionalEventDefinition>
        <bpmn:condition xsi:type="bpmn:tFormalExpression">select == "yes"</bpmn:condition>
      </bpmn:conditionalEventDefinition>
    </bpmn:boundaryEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_4" name="" sourceRef="node_6" targetRef="node_34"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_1" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_9</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_9" name="" sourceRef="node_31" targetRef="node_1"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="400" y="40" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <dc:Bounds x="400" y="120" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_10_di" bpmnElement="node_10">
        <di:waypoint x="418" y="58"/>
        <di:waypoint x="418" y="138"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <dc:Bounds x="240" y="200" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_12_di" bpmnElement="node_12">
        <dc:Bounds x="460" y="200" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="418" y="138"/>
        <di:waypoint x="298" y="238"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_21_di" bpmnElement="node_21">
        <di:waypoint x="418" y="138"/>
        <di:waypoint x="480" y="138"/>
        <di:waypoint x="518" y="238"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_31_di" bpmnElement="node_31">
        <dc:Bounds x="550" y="350" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_34_di" bpmnElement="node_34">
        <dc:Bounds x="360" y="470" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <di:waypoint x="518" y="238"/>
        <di:waypoint x="608" y="388"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <di:waypoint x="298" y="238"/>
        <di:waypoint x="378" y="488"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <dc:Bounds x="532" y="370" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <di:waypoint x="550" y="388"/>
        <di:waypoint x="440" y="388"/>
        <di:waypoint x="500" y="430"/>
        <di:waypoint x="378" y="488"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="680" y="480" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <di:waypoint x="608" y="388"/>
        <di:waypoint x="698" y="498"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.
